segments.text: What are you going to take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Roast pork chops with a bottle of red wine , please . Is soup served here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . What kind of soup do you like ? Clear or thick ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Clear soup . I think tomato soup is fine .
segments.speaker: S2
